name: orchestral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 connected with or involving an orchestra (= a large group of musicians who play many different instruments together): an orchestral arrangement The orchestral playing was tight and elegant. See
orchestra
More examplesFewer examplesThey have annual performances of the composer's major orchestral scores.He entered to rousing orchestral and choral music.She sang "Over the Rainbow" to live orchestral accompaniment.
